title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB:
When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, I encountered an issue with the 'Close All Saved' feature. The bug occurs when performing the following steps:
1. Close all open file editors.
2. Create a new file named 'f1.txt'.
3. Attempt to close all saved files by selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.

Observed Behavior: Nothing happens when 'Close All Saved' is selected from the file menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Install build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Open the application and close all open file editors.
3. Create a new file named 'f1.txt'
4. Attempt to close all saved files by selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.

Expected Behavior: All saved files should be closed when 'Close All Saved' is selected from the file menu.
